channel.title: [WITH VID] My First Project - Edgeville Pking [WITH VID]
channel.description:
Im going to try and make this a eco-pking server but not like too much eco (like no dds in store and it drops off a lvl 500 boss -.-) with all skills, full (almost rs) combat and those 474 animations that seem to be circling around :D... Im going to be using dev as a base and ive stolen some code from catherby pking to make the whole world pking :3... Ive added quite a bit to the client so far and havent done as much server side.
DONT WANNA READ? WATCH THIS VID! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Uq9C2WiS5BI
[b]Server Side Edits -[/b]
[code] 1. Made whole world pk.
2. Added highscores
3. Added range and melee following.. working on mage.
4. Made dds instant
5. Changed shops to make it more eco-friendly
6. Rewrote the combat system a lil.. range is a little overpowered now but atleast it isnt dev combat system
7. Added anti syi + (almost) anti null
8. Made exp rate 1k
9. Added a pvp point system
10. Added a ranks system
11. Added a rowkill system
12. Added chaos elemental minigame with cool gfx and more with attacks for it
13. Added donator area and portal
14. Added portal to KBD
15. Added a kills system and something that lets you check other peoples kills
16. Added a load of skills and a skilling area
17. Fixed up most skills
18. Added pvp timer so when a player runs they can still be attacked for 10 seconds.. (like runescape) [/code]
[b]Client Side Edits - [/b]
[code] 1. Added new runescape hp bars
2. Added real ags, claws and c bow gfx.
3. Added all of the above real animation
4. Changed the loading screen
5. Changed the loading bar
6. Added buttons for items k/o/d, Amount of cash carried and more
7. Added some custom interfaces
8. Added real magic hovering (shows full magic spells and on rollover shows what they do)
9. Added real dh axe graphics and whip graphics
10. Added real runescape hit splats [/code]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2r4oi93.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2em0nia.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/6roh9g.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/ftkoig.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/axdyiv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2u9l6y8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/21mu8mo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/ic61hd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/11wcb6d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/20tjifp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/35idurt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/mx09ix.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/a01g0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/fbkc2b.png[/img]
Thanks alot for looking at my devo thread.. You can beta test by dl'ing the client in my sig

item.dc:creator: @Chemist Chemist
item.description:
@Chemist wrote:

[quote=“moh, post:7, topic:320309”][quote author=Chemist link=topic=416793.msg3065341#msg3065341 date=1261181917]

oo good idea, Use SS GFX for chaos elemental.

leeches

Lol, why not just use the real gfx’s?

I thought this looked better than fire blast :3.
[/quote]
You’re creatieve , i liek that rep ++ ;d[/quote]

thanks :D![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 19, 2009, 10:47:14 am[/size][hr][quote=“Rixxx, post:8, topic:320309”]Good job and good luck with it.

I love that crafting interface.[/quote]

Thank you and im trying to adapt the crafting thing so its not just with leather atm :).
